formatted_address: Mount Alvernia Hospital, Annexe A, Thomson Rd, #01-01/02 820, Singapore 574623
name: Island Orthopaedics (Mount Alvernia Hospital)

reviews.text: Extremely grateful to Dr Gowreeson for his sane and incisive approach to treating a recent complex foot ankle and knee trauma. Unlike many in the medical and pharmaceutical industries, I believes he  adheres strongly to the principles of the Hippocratic oath and recommends what he thinks is best for the patient utilising his extensive skills and experience. He recommended and initiated immediate contact with a very skilled physiotherapist and ensured that he was updated regularly by the physios on a weekly basis to ensure that healing was going safely according to plan.

I want to thank Dr Gowreeson for taking good care of my sprained ankle. He approached my injury by giving suggestions with clear explanations for the pros and cons of each option. He operated on my right ankle that suffered ligaments tear and it was a success. My recovery has been great so far, and I have no issues resuming my physical activities.
Dr Gowreeson performed my ACL surgery, he's a great doctor and has a great team.

Googled and found this place, went to search for a senior doc for my husband but it was a disappointment!!

Consulted Dr Leslie, he was cocky, unprofessional with his advice and he wasn't compassionate at all. Requested for a memo letter but was given one that is totally useless.

He wasn't helpful and all the visits in couple of hundreds were all a waste of money. He kept sending us for X-ray & scans but the root cause hasn't improve at all.

Do avoid consulting Dr Leslie if you can, try other doctors.
Knowledgeable and Patient doctor. He is also a very meticulous specialist with detail explanation on my medical condition.

vicinity: Mount Alvernia Hospital, Annexe A, Thomson Road, #01-01/02 820
